original_text: And the rest of the oil that is in the priest's hand he shall put upon the head of him that is to be cleansed, to make an atonement for him before the Lord.
korean_text: 또 그 손에 남은 기름은 제사장이 그 정결함을 받는 자의 머리에 발라 여호와 앞에서 그를 위하여 속죄할 것이며

sentences.original_text: And the rest of the oil
that is in the priest's hand
he shall put upon the head
of him that is to be cleansed
to make an atonement for him
